meta.description: Master content schedule for TrailRiderGear.com. Prioritized by keyword search volume and commercial intent from kwrds.ai data (Feb 2026). Each post maps to products in scripts/product-library.json. Status: planned | in-progress | draft | published. Tier 1 = highest ROI (write first), Tier 2 = solid demand, Tier 3 = supporting content, Tier 4 = deprioritized.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Fishing Rod Holders
posts.notes: Covers Bike Fisherman, GearTrust, AteamProducts. 3 product cards.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Cargo Trailers and Racks
posts.notes: Covers Burley Flatbed/Nomad, Thule, Topeak, Planet Bike. 5 product cards.

posts.title: The Best Waterproof E-Bike Panniers
posts.notes: Covers Ortlieb, QuietKat, Thule Shield. 3+ product cards.

posts.title: The Best Electric Bikes for Hunting in 2026

secondary: best off road electric bike for hunting
off road electric bike for hunting
what is the best ebike for hunting

posts.notes: HIGHEST PRIORITY. Directly targets our niche. Feature QuietKat, PHILODO, FREESKY hunting-marketed bikes. Compare fat tire hunting e-bikes with features hunters care about: stealth (low noise), cargo capacity, range for backcountry access, camo options. Cross-link to accessory guides.

posts.title: The Best High-Performance Off-Road Electric Bikes

keywords.competition: LOW to HIGH (primary keyword LOW comp = goldmine)

posts.notes: MASSIVE volume opportunity. 'high performance electric bikes' is 12,100/mo at LOW competition. Feature dual-motor beasts, BAFANG-powered bikes, 40+ MPH machines. Compare wattage, torque, suspension, range. Link to hunting guide for hunting-specific angle.

posts.title: The Best Off-Road Electric Bikes for Trail Riding in 2026

secondary: off road e bikes for adults

posts.notes: High CPC = buyers are actively shopping. Broader than hunting — covers trail riding, camping, general off-road. Feature Himiway, ENGWE, FREESKY, PUCKIPUPPY. Cross-link to hunting guide and high-performance guide.

posts.title: The Must-Have E-Bike Accessories for Hunting and Fishing
posts.notes: PILLAR PAGE linking to all accessory guides. Roundup of top accessories across categories. Feature 1-2 products from each category. Drives internal links to every other guide on the site. Also cross-link to e-bike guides.

posts.title: The Best Off-Road E-Bike Helmets for Trail Riding
posts.notes: Validated by keyword data. MIPS technology, full-face vs open-face for e-bike speeds, ventilation, camo options. Products need to be researched (not yet in library).

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Trailer Hitches and Adapters
posts.notes: Strong trending keyword. Universal hitches, thru-axle adapters, fat tire bike compatibility. Burley hitch system, Schwinn, Allen Sports. Cross-link to cargo trailers guide.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Handlebar Bags for Quick-Access Gear
posts.notes: Validated by keyword data. Revelate Designs, Brooks England, Topeak. Snacks, phone, maps, ammo, small tackle.

posts.title: The Best Budget Off-Road Electric Bikes Under $1,000
posts.notes: Budget buyer intent. Feature sub-$1000 e-bikes. Jasion EB5 ($199), GOKEEP ($530), Kebiko ($899), FREESKY 2000W ($899). Compare bang-for-buck, range, motor power.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Gun Racks for Hunting
posts.notes: Niche but directly supports hunting audience. Research gun scabbards, handlebar mounts, frame-mounted racks. BAKCOU, Rambo, QuietKat offerings. Products not yet in library — most sold direct, not on Amazon.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Phone and GPS Mounts for Trail Navigation

keywords.note: Needs separate keyword research — likely has decent volume

posts.notes: Quad Lock, RAM Mount, Rokform. Waterproof options, vibration dampening. Products need research.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Lights for Early Morning Hunts and Night Fishing

keywords.note: Needs separate keyword research — 'best bike lights' is huge but competitive

posts.notes: High-lumen headlights, tail lights, helmet lights. Focus on dawn/dusk use cases. Products need research.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Locks for Remote Trailheads
posts.notes: Heavy-duty U-locks, chain locks, GPS trackers. Kryptonite, ABUS, Litelok. Products need research.

posts.title: The Best Portable Battery Packs for E-Bike Adventures

secondary: which ebike has the longest range

posts.notes: Power banks, solar chargers, USB charging. Anker, Goal Zero, BioLite. Products need research.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Cooler Bags for Fishing and Hunting Trips
posts.notes: Rack-mounted coolers, insulated panniers, soft coolers. Keep catch fresh. Products need research.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Bow Mounts for Archery Hunting
posts.notes: Compound bow and crossbow mounting. BAKCOU accessories. Zero keyword volume found but supports hunting niche audience.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Frame Bags for Bikepacking and Hunting Trips
posts.notes: Full-frame, half-frame, top tube bags. Revelate, Apidura. Battery clearance issues on e-bikes.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Tackle Storage Bags and Boxes
posts.notes: Frame bags, handlebar bags, rack-top boxes. Waterproof options. Zero keyword volume but supports fishing audience.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Fenders and Mudguards for Trail Riding
posts.notes: DEPRIORITIZED: Zero keyword volume found. Write only for internal linking. SKS, Mucky Nutz, PDW.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Game Carts and Deer Hauling Solutions
posts.notes: DEPRIORITIZED: Zero keyword volume. Niche hunting content. Write after Tier 1-3 complete.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Mirrors for Trail Safety
posts.notes: DEPRIORITIZED: Zero keyword volume. Write only for internal linking support.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Tire Repair Kits for Remote Trails
posts.notes: DEPRIORITIZED: Zero keyword volume. Supporting content only.

posts.title: The Best E-Bike Kickstands for Heavy Loads
posts.notes: DEPRIORITIZED: Zero keyword volume. Supporting content only.
